Tool Status

  • Tool is in running state
    Production
  • Tool parts to be installed.
    Installation
  • Tool is under maintenance
    Maintenance
  • Tool is ready to use.
    Idle

Tool Statistics

  • Total Production Time / Total Time ∗ 100
  • Total Installation Time / Total Time ∗ 100
  • Total Maintenance Time / Total Time ∗ 100
  • Total Idle Time / Total Time ∗ 100

Users Analytics

  • Represents how many hours user work for the tool

Project Analytics

  • Represents how many hours project was running on the tool
